data.comment: The match has started at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 2, Lens push forward at Stade Bollaert-Delelis and Gael Kakuta gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined PSG defence.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Lens.
In the minute 4, Lens awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lens.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Lens.
In the minute 10, In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lens's half?
Ball safe as Lens is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lens.
Lens are caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, PSG's Layvin Kurzawa gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lens defender.
Layvin Kurzawa for PSG gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 17, So close for Lens as Ignatius Kpene Ganago's shot comes back off the post.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago for Lens drives towards goal at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the finish is unsuccessful.
PSG to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 22, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
PSG's Kays Ruiz Atil misses with an attempt on goal.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Lens close to the penalty box.
Can Lens capitalize from this throw-in deep inside PSG's half?
At Stade Bollaert-Delelis, Lens are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 26, Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Lens.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a PSG throw-in in Lens's half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG.
In the minute 28, In Lens, Ander Herrera of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Lens's area.
PSG are whistled for offside.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for PSG in the half of Lens.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 33, Throw-in Lens.
Free kick for Lens in the half of PSG.
Lens have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In the minute 35, Important block from the PSG defence as Simon Banza fires in a strike for Lens.
Corner awarded to Lens.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
In the minute 38, Pablo Sarabia is booked for the away team.
In the minute 41, Lens have a goal kick.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lens.
In the minute 44, Free kick for PSG in the half of Lens.
Lens's Cheick Oumar Doucoure has been booked in Lens.
Lens needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
Lens have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Lens.
Can Lens get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 50, Lens advance rapidly upfield but Hakim Ben el Hadj blows for offside.
PSG push upfield but Hakim Ben el Hadj quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Lens in their own half.
In the minute 52, PSG have been awarded a corner by Hakim Ben el Hadj.
In Lens PSG attack through Marco Verratti. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lens.
In the minute 55, PSG's Layvin Kurzawa breaks free at Stade Bollaert-Delelis. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lens goal kick.
PSG drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 56, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a throw-in for PSG, close to Lens's area.
Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
PSG awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG.
In the minute 63, Lens push forward at Stade Bollaert-Delelis and Simon Banza gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the PSG defence.
Ignatius Kpene Ganago gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lens.
Throw-in for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 64, In Lens a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Florian Sotoca is replacing Simon Banza for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
In the minute 66, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for PSG close to the penalty box.
Ander Herrera of PSG gets in a strike, but is off target.
Hakim Ben el Hadj awards Lens a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Colin Dagba is on a sub for Kays Ruiz Atil for PSG.
Throw-in PSG.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Stade Bollaert-Delelis, Florian Sotoca has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Lens to check on Presnel Kimpembe, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 71, The home team have replaced Gael Kakuta with Yannick Cahuzac. This is the second substitution made today by Franck Haise.
Lens make their third substitution with Corentin Jean replacing Ignatius Kpene Ganago.
Presnel Kimpembe is back on the pitch.
In the minute 74, Free kick Lens.
It seems as if Presnel Kimpembe is unable to continue. Abdou Diallo replaces him for the away team.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's third substitution at Stade Bollaert-Delelis with Jese replacing Arnaud Kalimuendo.
In the minute 75, Hakim Ben el Hadj awards the away team a throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a PSG throw-in in Lens's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 77, Free kick for Lens in their own half.
Throw-in for Lens in the half of PSG.
In the minute 78, Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lens.
Can Lens capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Juan Bernat (PSG) gets a yellow card.
In Lens, Florian Sotoca (Lens) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for PSG at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Can PSG capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lens's half?
Franck Haise (Lens) is making a fourth substitution, with Tony Mauricio replacing Cheick Oumar Doucoure.
Lens have a goal kick.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Issiaga Sylla with Ismael Boura. This is the fifth substitution made today by Franck Haise.
Thomas Tuchel (PSG) is making a fourth substitution, with Mitchel Bakker replacing Juan Bernat.
In the minute 85, Free kick PSG.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to Lens in their own half.
In Lens a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 87, Free kick for PSG in the half of Lens.
PSG to take a throw-in in Lens territory.
Throw-in Lens.
Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Lens.
Goal kick for Lens at Stade Bollaert-Delelis.
Lens awarded a free kick in their own half.
PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
Hakim Ben el Hadj signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
It's 1-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
